title: Jacket
description: yoke heavily cross stitched with animal figures on shoulders and back; predominately bright pink with green and yellow; top of sleeves have coarse embroidery in bright pink, magenta and black on hemp base; front edges have tape embroidered in same colors; two embroidered squares on back; lower back border has geometric embroidery--magenta/purple, white, blue and green; lower end has double row of small silver metal pieces--hand stitched
creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
